statements: UPDATE WeatherConditions SET temperature = 25.5, precipitation = 3.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WeatherConditions SET wind_speed = 15.6, impact_on_farming = 'High' WHERE date = '2022-09-15';

UPDATE WeatherConditions SET precipitation = 0.8, impact_on_farming = 'High' WHERE temperature > 30;
UPDATE climate_conditions SET temperature = 28.5, humidity = 65.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE farming_activities SET impact = 'Low impact on soil' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE climate_conditions SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.0 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE farming_activities SET impact = 'High impact on crop yield' WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND activity_type = 'Harvesting';
UPDATE WeatherConditions SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 70.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FarmingActivities SET activity_end = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE activity_name = 'Harvesting';
UPDATE WeatherConditions SET temperature = 27.5, humidity = 60.4 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE WeatherConditions SET precipitation = 0.2, temperature = 28.9 WHERE weather_id = 1001;
UPDATE Farmers SET farmer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE farmer_id = 2005;
